accessPage(int, int) - Method in class VirtueelGeheugen.Simulation.Process
Used with a read or write to get a page from RAM or move it to RAM if it is not in RAM.

Method to set the information of a certain frame.

Method to be called when adding to add a page.

addToRAM(int, Process, int) - Method in class VirtueelGeheugen.Simulation.Hardware.PageTable.PageTable
Method that will add a certain page to RAM by setting: The present bit to 1 (true).
addToRAM(int, Process, int, int) - Method in class VirtueelGeheugen.Simulation.Hardware.PageTable.PageTable
Used to swap 2 pages from the same process.
addToRAM(int, int) - Method in class VirtueelGeheugen.Simulation.Hardware.PageTable.PageTableEntry
